name: Balloonife
description:
This was the game created for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Pop the balloons with an uncontrolled knife! Try to control the knife in the right direction to pop the balloons.

Hold the left mouse button to choose which direction the knife should go and release when aiming at the balloons to pop them.

Assets used in the game:

Music from https://freemusicarchive.org/genre/Chiptune/

SoundFX from https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com and https://freesound.org/people/Prof.Mudkip/sounds/386862

Sprites from https://opengameart.org
